com.github.nsc.de.shake.lexer.characterinput.position

Class PositionMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nsc.de.shake.lexer.characterinput.position.PositionMaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PositionMarker

    public class PositionMaker
extends Object
implements PositionMarker
    A modifiable PositionMarker that stores the positions of the line-separators
